newsitem.title: JAPAN: Toshiba up on laggard buying, despite yen.
newsitem.headline: Toshiba up on laggard buying, despite yen.

text.p: Toshiba Corp shares edged higher in the Tuesday morning session, as institutional investors sought lagging high technology shares despite the recent strength of the yen against the dollar, brokers said.
As of 0135 GMT, Toshiba shares were up three yen at 748, on trade totalling 2.28 million shares, the most actively traded issue on the first section of the Tokyo bourse.

"The share is regarded as a high-tech laggard and investors like the issue even more because it has been unscathed by the recent strength in the yen, showing that it has growth potential," a general manager at a middle-sized brokerage said.
